stepTitle: A farmer is mixing a solution to fertilize his crops. The farmer starts with $$50$$ gallons of water in his tank and adds $$2$$ pounds of fertilizer per minute. At the same time, water flows into the tank at a rate of $$5$$ gallons per minute. Find the concentration (pounds per gallon) of fertilizer in the tank after $$15$$ minutes. Is that concentration greater, the same, or less than the initial concentration?
